metadata.title: CVE-2017-17526 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Input.cc in Bernard Parisse Giac 1.2.3.57 does not validate strings beforelaunching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, whichmight allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via acrafted URL.

criterions.comment: giac package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
